Summary: A flying object was caught on the 12 noon Fox 5 News on 8/13/08
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Waldorf
There were no other sightings in Waldorf on or around August 13th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw an object streaking across the sky extremely fast when the weatherman was talking about the weather forcast for today, August 13, 2008 around 12:30pm. The object was moving to fast to be a plane, jet, or anything other than an UFO. Request Fox5 New in the Washington DC area to review the tape to see the UFO
